snippet: A federal prosecutor accuses President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner of shielding Iranian officials accused in a 1994 bombing of a Jewish community center.
abstract: Special prosecutor charges Argentinian Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner and Foreign Min Hector Timerman with covering up agreement with Iran to speed investigation into Iran's 1994 bombing of Jewish community center in Buenos Aires; legal complaint holds that Iran agreed to send oil to Argentina in exchange for agreement.
lead_paragraph: A federal prosecutor accuses President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner of shielding Iranian officials accused in a 1994 bombing of a Jewish community center.

headline.main: Argentine President Accused of Cover-Up in Bombing Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Leader Accused of Bomb Inquiry Cover-Up
